author: Ron Kohavi and Barry G. Becker and Dan Sommerfield
title: Improving Simple Bayes
venue: Data Mining and Visualization Group Silicon Graphics, Inc
window: was large or artificial, indicating that a single test set would yield accurate estimates, we used a training-set/test-set as defined in the source for the dataset (e.g., Statlog defined the splits for DNA, letter, satimage; CART defined the training size for waveform and led24) or a 2/3, 1/3 split, and ran the inducer once; otherwise, we performed 10-fold
